definitions.definition: (of an illness) Transmitted from one person to another, usually through the air breathed.
(of a person) Able to infect others.
definitions.example: Despite feeling better, the patient is still infectious.

definitions.definition: (of feelings and behaviour) Spreading quickly from one person to another.
definitions.example: Her enthusiasm for work can be really infectious.

definitions.definition: Memorable and invoking excitement or interest.
definitions.example: Pop music is more infectious than elevator music.
